com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.texture

Interface ITextureCoordinator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTextureCoordinator

    public interface ITextureCoordinator
    Coordinates the texture bindings to texture units.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static interface  ITextureCoordinator.ITextureCoordinatorFactory

    • Method Detail

      • getTextureManager

        ITextureManager getTextureManager()
        Returns:
        The texture manager for this coordinator.

      • bindTexture

        int bindTexture(ITexture texture)
        Binds the given texture to a texture unit on the GPU.

        An optimal binding index will be determined, possibly overriding an existing binding.
        If the texture is already bound by this coordinator, there will be no effect.

        Note: The texture must be managed and loaded by this coordinator's texture manager.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture that should be bound.
        Returns:
        The index of the texture unit the texture was bound to.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the texture is not loaded by this coordinator's texture manager.
        NullPointerException - If texture is null.

      • requestIndexFor

        int requestIndexFor(ITexture texture)
        Determines a binding index for the given texture and marks it as externally bound.

        The binding index will be determined in the same way as bindTexture(ITexture), only the texture will not be bound.
        If the texture is already bound by this coordinator, there will be no effect.

        The coordinator will assume that the texture is bound to that index.
        No calls to the GPU will be made.

        Note: The texture must be managed and loaded by this coordinator's texture manager.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture for which a index should be determined.
        Returns:
        The index of the texture unit that was chosen.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the texture is not loaded by this coordinator's texture manager.
        NullPointerException - If texture is null.

      • peekIndexFor

        int peekIndexFor(ITexture texture)
        Determines a binding index for the given texture.

        The binding index will be determined in the same way as bindTexture(ITexture), without having an effect.

        Note: The texture must be managed and loaded by this coordinator's texture manager.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture for which a index should be determined.
        Returns:
        The index of the texture unit that was chosen.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the texture is not loaded by this coordinator's texture manager.
        NullPointerException - If texture is null.

      • unbindTexture

        void unbindTexture(ITexture texture)
        Unbinds the given texture.

        If the texture is not bound by this coordinator, there will be no effect.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture that should be unbound.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If texture is null.

      • getTextureIndexFor

        int getTextureIndexFor(ITexture texture)
        Returns the index of the texture unit that the given texture is bound to.
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture of which the binding index should be returned.
        Returns:
        A texture unit index, or -1 if the texture is not bound by this coordinator.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If texture is null.

      • getBoundTextureForIndex

        ITexture getBoundTextureForIndex(int textureIndex)
        Returns the texture which is bound for the given index.
        Parameters:
        textureIndex - The binding index for which the texture should be returned.
        Returns:
        A texture, or null if no texture is bound for the index by this coordinator.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If textureIndex < 0.

      • isTextureBoundForIndex

        boolean isTextureBoundForIndex(ITexture texture,
                               int textureIndex)
        Returns whether the given texture is bound on the given index.
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture.
        textureIndex - The binding index.
        Returns:
        True if the texture is bound for the index, false if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If textureIndex < 0.
        NullPointerException - If texture is null.

      • getUsedIndexCount

        int getUsedIndexCount()
        Returns:
        The current number of available binding indexes (free and used).

      • getBoundIndexCount

        int getBoundIndexCount()
        Returns:
        The current number of used binding indexes.
